attributes.action: Bring the brexit deal back to the vote of the public because of broken promises
attributes.additional_details: The public didn’t know what they were voting for and were mid lead in the original referendum. The promises made by the government have been broken so we should vote again
attributes.background: The brexit deal should be put to the public again in another referendum vote as the promises that were made are not being delivered and the governments own ministers are resigning because of those reasons.
